edu.cmu.lti.oaqa.bio.entrezgene_wrapper
Class EntrezGeneWrapper

java.lang.Object
  edu.cmu.lti.oaqa.bio.entrezgene_wrapper.EntrezGeneWrapper
All Implemented Interfaces:
edu.cmu.lti.oaqa.bio.resource_wrapper.ResourceWrapper, edu.cmu.lti.oaqa.bio.resource_wrapper.ResourceWrapperExtended
public class EntrezGeneWrapper
extends java.lang.Object
implements edu.cmu.lti.oaqa.bio.resource_wrapper.ResourceWrapperExtended

A class to wrap the functionality of Entrez Gene E-Utilities, primarily search and fetch. Search and summary results are cached locally for faster retrieval. See EntrezGeneExample for generic uses of this class.

Version:
0.3
Author:
Collin McCormack (cmccorma)
See Also:
ResourceWrapper, ResourceWrapperExtended

Constructor Detail

public EntrezGeneWrapper()
Creates a new EntrezGene object (creates new caches).

Method Detail

search

public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> search(java.lang.String queryTerms)
                                             throws java.io.IOException
Uses the Entrez Gene web service to search the database using the contents of queryTerms. By default, returns 20 results.
The result can be plugged right into 'fetch' to get Entity's
Search results are cached by url.

Parameters:
queryTerms - a String query
Returns:
an ArrayList of EntrezGene UID's, empty ArrayList on error
Throws:
java.io.IOException

getSummary

public java.lang.String getSummary(java.lang.String id)
                            throws java.io.IOException
Query the Entrez Gene web service for additional information associated with an ID.

Parameters:
id - Entrez Gene ID String
Returns:
String name of the item associated with the supplied ID
Throws:
java.io.IOException

fetch

public edu.cmu.lti.oaqa.bio.resource_wrapper.Entity fetch(java.lang.String id)
                                                   throws java.io.IOException
Uses the Entrez Gene web service to fetch an entry based on a unique Entrez Gene UID. The XML response is parsed and the relevant information extracted into a Entity object, which is returned.

Parameters:
id - the Entrez Gene UID to fetch (String)
Returns:
an Entity object containing the information from the response, null if XMl is absent, malformed, or does not contain a name
Throws:
java.io.IOException

fetchXML

public org.w3c.dom.Document fetchXML(java.lang.String id)
                              throws java.io.IOException
Useful method for debugging Entrez Gene responses. Returns an XML DOM Document.

Parameters:
id - the Entrez Gene UID to fetch (String)
Returns:
XML Document
Throws:
java.io.IOException

getEntities

public java.util.ArrayList<edu.cmu.lti.oaqa.bio.resource_wrapper.Entity> getEntities(java.lang.String query)
General query for Entrez Gene. Maximum of 10 Entity's are returned in an ArrayList<Entity>. If the query returns no results, an empty ArrayList is returned. Additionally, it will return null if an IOException occurs.

Specified by:
getEntities in interface edu.cmu.lti.oaqa.bio.resource_wrapper.ResourceWrapper
Parameters:
query - search terms
Returns:
An ArrayList<Entity> containing matching Entity's (max 10 items)

getEntities

public java.util.ArrayList<edu.cmu.lti.oaqa.bio.resource_wrapper.Entity> getEntities(java.lang.String query,
                                                                                     boolean exactMatch)
Overloaded version of getEntities that tests for an exact match (case-insensitive). Exact matching is done for name and synonyms. Definition, relations, and ID are left out to prevent spurious matches. If an ID match is desired, use getEntitiesById.

Specified by:
getEntities in interface edu.cmu.lti.oaqa.bio.resource_wrapper.ResourceWrapper
Parameters:
query - search terms
exactMatch - boolean flag for an exact match test on each result
Returns:
ArrayList<Entity> of matching entities, empty if no results from search, null on error

getEntities

public java.util.ArrayList<edu.cmu.lti.oaqa.bio.resource_wrapper.Entity> getEntities(java.lang.String query,
                                                                                     java.lang.String aType)
The same behavior as getEntities(query), but does an additional comparison against the type. Currently it's a 'dumb' comparison (exact match, not case-sensitive).

Specified by:
getEntities in interface edu.cmu.lti.oaqa.bio.resource_wrapper.ResourceWrapperExtended
Parameters:
query - search terms
aType - type as String
Returns:
An ArrayList<Entity> of matching Entity objects
See Also:
Entity

getEntityById

public edu.cmu.lti.oaqa.bio.resource_wrapper.Entity getEntityById(java.lang.String id)
NOTE: This is method does not work very well for Entrez Gene default search, using getEntityById(id, exactMatch=true) is highly advised. Retrieves an Entity via the Entrez Gene web service. The first result of a search is returned. If there are no results, then null is returned.

Specified by:
getEntityById in interface edu.cmu.lti.oaqa.bio.resource_wrapper.ResourceWrapper
Parameters:
id - String representing the id to search for, either a number or in the style of "AUTHORTIY:0001"
Returns:
An Entity, if no results then null

getEntityById

public edu.cmu.lti.oaqa.bio.resource_wrapper.Entity getEntityById(java.lang.String id,
                                                                  boolean exactMatch)
Retrieves an Entity via the Entrez Gene web service. If exactMatch is true, then "id" is compared against retrieved ID's until a match is found. If no match is found, return null. If exactMatch is false, then the simpler getEntityById(String id) is called.

Specified by:
getEntityById in interface edu.cmu.lti.oaqa.bio.resource_wrapper.ResourceWrapper
Parameters:
id - String representing the id to search for, either a number or in the style of "AUTHORTIY:0001"
exactMatch - boolean flag for an exact match test on each result
Returns:
An Entity matching the queried id, if no match then null

getRelatedEntities

public java.util.ArrayList<edu.cmu.lti.oaqa.bio.resource_wrapper.Entity> getRelatedEntities(edu.cmu.lti.oaqa.bio.resource_wrapper.Entity eObj,
                                                                                            edu.cmu.lti.oaqa.bio.resource_wrapper.Relation relObj)
Not implemented for Entrez Gene. Entrez Gene is not a graph (or anything like one) and as such does not have easily search-able relationships.

Specified by:
getRelatedEntities in interface edu.cmu.lti.oaqa.bio.resource_wrapper.ResourceWrapperExtended
Throws:
UnsupposrtedOperationException

getEntities

public java.util.ArrayList<edu.cmu.lti.oaqa.bio.resource_wrapper.Entity> getEntities(java.lang.String query,
                                                                                     edu.cmu.lti.oaqa.bio.species_mapper.Species species)
General query for Entrez Gene, species parameter is used to narrow results to only the species specified. Otherwise, behaves like getEntities(query)

Specified by:
getEntities in interface edu.cmu.lti.oaqa.bio.resource_wrapper.ResourceWrapperExtended
Parameters:
query - A String of query terms
species - A Species object, as is returned by SpeciesMapper
